body:
Unable to create/use permanents with a single red mana as activation cost, as it is then returned to hand instead.

Suggest {Rt}, {RT} or similar as a replacement
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: {R} as return permanent conflicts with {R} single red mana as activation cost

comments.body:
Oh no! Thanks for catching this.

**Status:** Started

comments.body: Whew, luckily it is not in the released version.

comments.body: Hmm, now that you brought this up, {S} for Sacrifice this permanent also conflicts with snow mana. Think I'll do it as "Sacrifice this" and "Return this"
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Since we already have a effect for returning this permanent to hand, probably easiest to reuse that template to reduce confusion. So final version is "Return SN to its owner's hand"
